byline.original: By SAEED AL-BATATI and KAREEM FAHIM

abstract: Saudi-led military coalition resumes airstrikes in Yemen and conducts bombings in capital Sana and in provinces, indication that offensive against Houthi rebels is broadening; resumption runs contrary to Saudi officials' claims that they were shifting focus to humanitarian relief and political negotiations.
lead_paragraph: In addition to the bombings in Sana, the coalition carried out airstrikes in several other provinces, suggesting a broadening, rather than a scaling back of the monthlong air offensive against the Houthi rebels.

headline.main: Saudi-Led Air Campaign Resumes in Yemeni Capital
headline.print_headline: Saudi-Led Air Campaign Resumes in Yemeni Capital

snippet: In addition to the bombings in Sana, the coalition carried out airstrikes in several other provinces, suggesting a broadening, rather than a scaling back of the monthlong air offensive against the Houthi rebels.
